input.sentences: i recently went to my friend 's wedding .
here is everybody gathered waiting for it to start .
the bride and the groom are walking down the aisle !
here is the reception afterwards | i wish the couple the best !
output.sentences: Barbara was excited that the day of her best friend's wedding had finally arrived.
The guests waited with anticipation for things to get underway.
Finally the bride and groom headed down the aisle.
People were full of emotion watching the couple exchange their heartfelt vows.
After the ceremony, the reception provided opportunities to socialize and connect.
